title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse – Your Comfortable Computing Companion!

Are you looking for an easy-to-use mouse that doesn't require constant movement of your arm? Look no further! The Logitech Trackman Marble is here to make your computer time more enjoyable, especially if moving a traditional mouse has become a hassle.

Here's why the Trackman Marble will be the perfect addition to your computer setup:

- **Simple Connectivity:** This mouse easily connects to your computer with a choice of PS/2 or USB ports, making it versatile and compatible with most systems.

- **Gentle on the Hands:** With a unique trackball feature, you can keep your hand and arm relaxed. The trackball lets you navigate your screen effortlessly without the need to move the mouse across a desk.

- **Customized Scrolling:** Enjoy smooth side-to-side scrolling with just a touch of your finger, making browsing through long articles or spreadsheets a breeze.

- **Designed for Everyone:** Whether you're left-handed or right-handed, the Logitech Trackman Marble welcomes you with open arms! Its ambidextrous design ensures comfort for all users.

- **Easy to See:** Available in three distinct colors – red, gray, and white – you can choose the one that best suits your style or is easiest for you to spot.

- **Just the Right Size:** Measuring 7 inches long, 2.5 inches tall, and 4 inches wide, it's the perfect size to fit comfortably in your hand without taking up too much space on your desk.

- **Simple Controls:** With two buttons, you'll have all the control you need without any complication. It's straightforward, with no unnecessary extra buttons to confuse you.

- **Quality You Can Trust:** Proudly made with care in China, the Logitech Trackman Marble is built to last.

Enjoy your computer time with less strain and more comfort. The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is not just another mouse; it's a step towards effortless, comfortable computer use. Get yours today and experience the ease it brings to your daily computing tasks!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 – a user-friendly trackball mouse designed for maximum comfort and ease of use, perfect for our senior computer users who deserve a comfortable computing experience!

Are you looking for a mouse that's easy on your hands and doesn't require you to move your arm? Look no further! Our Logitech Trackman Marble is equipped with a stationary trackball that lets you control the cursor with a simple roll of your thumb. This means less strain on your wrist and arm, allowing you to work or browse with ease.

Key Features:
- **Simple Connectivity**: With both PS/2 and USB options, you can easily connect the mouse to your computer – plug it in, and you're ready to go!
- **Easy-to-See Colors**: Available in three distinct colors - red, gray, and white - you can choose the one that best suits your style or is easiest for you to see.
- **Comfortable Dimensions**: The mouse is designed with dimensions that provide a comfortable grip: 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width.
- **Effortless Scrolling**: Side-to-side scrolling is a breeze with this mouse, making it simpler to navigate spreadsheets or wide web pages without moving the mouse around.
- **Two-Button Design**: The mouse has two buttons for easy clicking, perfect for performing all your necessary tasks without any complication.
- **Ambidextrous Design**: Whether you're left-handed or right-handed, our mouse is built for you, ensuring a comfortable experience for all users.
- **Quality Assurance**: Crafted with care in China, this mouse is built to last and will keep you clicking and scrolling day after day.

The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is not just another mouse; it's a step towards more comfortable computing for our beloved elderly users. Say goodbye to the hassle of traditional mice and hello to effortless navigation. Get yours today and enjoy the ease of computing like never before!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse – the comfortable and easy-to-use computer mouse that's perfect for anyone who values comfort and simplicity! 

Are you looking for a mouse that's easy on your hands and wrists? The Logitech Trackman Marble is designed with your comfort in mind. Its trackball feature means you won't have to move your arm around to navigate your computer screen; simply roll the ball with your thumb or finger, and you're in control!

You'll love how this mouse fits snugly in your hand, whether you're left-handed or right-handed. It's perfectly symmetrical, so everyone can enjoy the same comfortable experience. And with its two-button design, there are no complicated extra buttons to figure out – just two simple buttons for easy clicking.

The Trackman Marble connects to your computer through a PS/2 port or a USB port, so it's versatile enough to use with almost any setup. Plus, at 300 dots per inch (DPI), it's precise enough for your everyday tasks without being overly sensitive.

Choose your favorite color from red, gray, or white to match your personal style or your computer setup. And don't worry about it taking up too much space; with dimensions of 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, it's the perfect size for any desk.

Finally, the side-to-side scrolling feature allows you to navigate through documents or web pages with ease, adding an extra layer of convenience to your browsing.

The Logitech Trackman Marble is thoughtfully made and comes from China, ensuring quality and reliability. Give your hands the ease they deserve with a mouse that's built for comfort and simplicity. Get your Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse today and enjoy the smooth, easy control that makes computing a breeze!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017, a trackball mouse designed with both simplicity and comfort in mind. This easy-to-use mouse is perfect for those who are looking for a straightforward, reliable solution to navigate their computer without the hassle of moving a traditional mouse around.

Key Features:
- **Trackball Design**: With its stationary trackball feature, you won't need to move the mouse across your desk. This is particularly helpful if desk space is limited or if you find that moving a regular mouse is uncomfortable.
- **Easy Scrolling**: The side-to-side scrolling function allows you to glide through web pages and documents with ease.
- **Universal Design**: Whether you're left-handed or right-handed, the Logitech Trackman Marble is designed to accommodate your needs, ensuring a comfortable experience for everyone.
- **Simple Connectivity**: It connects to your computer via PS/2 or USB port, providing flexibility and ease of use.
- **Adjustable DPI**: With a 300 DPI setting, the mouse provides accurate control for a variety of tasks without being overly sensitive.
- **Stylish Colors**: Available in a selection of colors – red, gray, and white – to match your personal style or decor.
- **Compact Size**: Its dimensions of 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width mean it won't take up much space on your desk.

Whether you're writing emails, browsing the internet, or enjoying photos of your family, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 is a great companion for your computer. Its comfortable design and ease of use make it an ideal choice for those who value comfort and simplicity in their daily computer use. Plus, it's built to last and comes from Logitech, a brand known for quality computer accessories. Try it out and feel the difference!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, the ideal companion for your desktop needs. This user-friendly mouse is designed with both comfort and simplicity in mind, making it a perfect choice for our esteemed elderly customers.

Are you tired of the hassle that comes with regular mice? The Logitech Trackman Marble is here to offer a seamless and stable experience. With its unique trackball feature, you won't have to move the mouse around your desk anymore. Simply roll the large, easy-to-use marble with your fingertips, and watch the cursor glide across your screen with precision and ease.

This trackball mouse comes with the convenience of dual connectivity, supporting both PS/2 and USB ports, so you can easily connect it to your computer without any fuss. And don't worry about compatibility; whether you're left-handed or right-handed, the Logitech Trackman Marble is designed to suit your needs perfectly.

Featuring a gentle curve and a comfortable size — 7 inches long, 2.5 inches high, and 4 inches wide — it is crafted to fit snugly in the palm of your hand. Plus, the large buttons are easy to locate and press without any strain, giving you a stress-free experience while navigating your computer.

The mouse is not just about comfort; it's also about control. With a 300 DPI sensitivity, it offers smooth and responsive tracking, making everything from browsing the internet to editing photos a breeze. And for those who love to read or work on spreadsheets, the side-to-side scrolling function is a godsend, allowing you to navigate horizontally with just a touch.

Choose from three classic colors: red, gray, or white, to match your style or your computer setup. Rest assured, this high-quality product is built to last, with its origins in the reliable manufacturing of China.

Simplify your computer use with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. It's not just a mouse; it's an upgrade to a more comfortable and accessible way to interact with your digital world. Order yours today and experience the difference!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse – the perfect companion for your computer that offers comfort, precision, and ease of use, designed with both left-handed and right-handed users in mind.

Are you looking for a mouse that's easy on your wrist and simple to control? Look no further. The Trackman Marble features a large, smooth trackball that stays in place, which means you move the cursor without moving your arm. It's great for tight workspaces and busy desks.

With its convenient side-to-side scrolling, you can easily navigate through web pages or spreadsheets with just a touch of your finger. Plus, with two easy-to-click buttons, everything you need is at your fingertips. 

This trackball mouse is as adaptable as it is functional, offering both PS/2 and USB connectivity, ensuring it will work with your setup whether it's modern or a bit more traditional. A comfortable size at 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, it's designed not to take up too much space on your desk.

Available in three classic colors – red, gray, and white – to match your personal style or computer setup. And with a sensible DPI of 300, you'll have the accuracy you need for everyday tasks without any unnecessary complexity.

The Logitech Trackman Marble is suitable for everyone, whether you're right or left-handed, and it's made with the quality you can trust, originating from China. Simplify your computer use with this trackball mouse that combines traditional craftsmanship with modern convenience. Get your hands on the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse today and experience the comfort and control you've been looking for!
